name: Battle Royale Unsung Heroes
description:
Battle Royale: Unsung Heroes a.k.a. BRUH.IO is a classic round-based last man standing shooter playable right in your browser. Find weaponry throughout the world and try and outplay your enemies. If you die, spectate the living players until the round resets.

If you register & log in your Win and Kill stats will be saved, allowing you to compete on the global leaderboard. The global leaderboard is season-based. Stats will reset between seasons allowing a new wave of competitors to challenge the old pros. Custom skins and in-game titles will be awarded to the champions of competitive seasons.
